api_ports.name: getAccountID
api_ports.description: Retrieves the unique account ID associated with a given customer ID.

api_ports.name: getAccountIDfromName
api_ports.description: Retrieves the unique account ID associated with a given Name.

api_ports.name: getAccountBalance
api_ports.description: Retrieves the current balance for a specific account.

api_ports.name: getTransactionHistory
api_ports.description: Retrieves the transaction history for a specific account within a date range.

api_ports.name: initiateTransfer
api_ports.description: Initiates a transfer of funds from one account to another.

api_ports.name: getTransferStatus
api_ports.description: Retrieves the status of a specific funds transfer.

api_ports.name: cancelTransfer
api_ports.description: Cancels a pending funds transfer.

api_ports.name: getAccountDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific bank account.

api_ports.name: updateAccountDetails
api_ports.description: Updates the details for a specific bank account.

api_ports.name: getAccountHolderDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of the account holder for a specific account.

api_ports.name: updateAccountHolderDetails
api_ports.description: Updates the details of the account holder for a specific account.

api_ports.name: getAvailableAccounts
api_ports.description: Retrieves a list of all available accounts for a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getLoanDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves details of a specific loan account.

api_ports.name: applyForLoan
api_ports.description: Applies for a new loan for a customer.

api_ports.name: getLoanStatus
api_ports.description: Retrieves the status of a specific loan application.

api_ports.name: makeLoanPayment
api_ports.description: Makes a payment towards a specific loan.

api_ports.name: getCreditCardList
api_ports.description: Retrieves all number of credit cards.

api_ports.name: getCreditCardDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves details of a specific credit card.

api_ports.name: getCreditCardStatement
api_ports.description: Retrieves the statement for a specific credit card for a given period.

api_ports.name: makeCreditCardPayment
api_ports.description: Makes a payment towards a specific credit card.

api_ports.name: getCreditLimit
api_ports.description: Retrieves the credit limit for a specific credit card.

api_ports.name: increaseCreditLimit
api_ports.description: Requests an increase in the credit limit for a specific credit card.

api_ports.name: blockCreditCard
api_ports.description: Blocks a specific credit card due to loss or theft.

api_ports.name: unblockCreditCard
api_ports.description: Unblocks a previously blocked credit card.

api_ports.name: getFixedDepositDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific fixed deposit account.

api_ports.name: openFixedDeposit
api_ports.description: Opens a new fixed deposit account.

api_ports.name: closeFixedDeposit
api_ports.description: Closes a fixed deposit account and transfers the amount to the linked account.

api_ports.name: getRecurringDepositDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific recurring deposit account.

api_ports.name: openRecurringDeposit
api_ports.description: Opens a new recurring deposit account.

api_ports.name: closeRecurringDeposit
api_ports.description: Closes a recurring deposit account and transfers the amount to the linked account.

api_ports.name: getLoanRepaymentSchedule
api_ports.description: Retrieves the repayment schedule for a specific loan.

api_ports.name: getInvestmentPortfolio
api_ports.description: Retrieves the investment portfolio details for a specific customer.

api_ports.name: buyInvestment
api_ports.description: Purchases an investment for a customer.

api_ports.name: sellInvestment
api_ports.description: Sells an investment for a customer.

api_ports.name: getInvestmentDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves details of a specific investment.

api_ports.name: getInsurancePolicyDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves details of a specific insurance policy.

api_ports.name: applyForInsurance
api_ports.description: Applies for a new insurance policy for a customer.

api_ports.name: getInsuranceClaimStatus
api_ports.description: Retrieves the status of a specific insurance claim.

api_ports.name: fileInsuranceClaim
api_ports.description: Files a new claim against an insurance policy.

api_ports.name: payInsurancePremium
api_ports.description: Pays the premium for a specific insurance policy.

api_ports.name: getMortgageDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific mortgage account.

api_ports.name: applyForMortgage
api_ports.description: Applies for a new mortgage loan for a customer.

api_ports.name: getMortgageRepaymentSchedule
api_ports.description: Retrieves the repayment schedule for a specific mortgage.

api_ports.name: makeMortgagePayment
api_ports.description: Makes a payment towards a specific mortgage.

api_ports.name: getMortgageBalance
api_ports.description: Retrieves the current outstanding balance for a specific mortgage.

api_ports.name: getOverdraftDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the overdraft details for a specific account.

api_ports.name: applyForOverdraft
api_ports.description: Applies for an overdraft facility on a specific account.

api_ports.name: getOverdraftLimit
api_ports.description: Retrieves the overdraft limit for a specific account.

api_ports.name: increaseOverdraftLimit
api_ports.description: Requests an increase in the overdraft limit for a specific account.

api_ports.name: getAccountStatements
api_ports.description: Retrieves account statements for a specific account within a date range.

api_ports.name: downloadStatement
api_ports.description: Downloads a specific account statement in the requested format.

api_ports.name: getBranchDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific bank branch.

api_ports.name: getNearestBranch
api_ports.description: Finds the nearest branch based on the given location.

api_ports.name: getBranchHours
api_ports.description: Retrieves the operating hours for a specific branch.

api_ports.name: getATMDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific ATM.

api_ports.name: getNearestATM
api_ports.description: Finds the nearest ATM based on the given location.

api_ports.name: getATMCardList
api_ports.description: Get ATM card from account ID.

api_ports.name: reportLostATMCard
api_ports.description: Reports a lost ATM card and blocks it.

api_ports.name: orderNewATMCard
api_ports.description: Orders a new ATM card for a specific account.

api_ports.name: activateATMCard
api_ports.description: Activates a newly issued ATM card.

api_ports.name: changeATMPIN
api_ports.description: Changes the PIN for a specific ATM card.

api_ports.name: getCurrencyExchangeRates
api_ports.description: Retrieves the current exchange rates for a specific currency pair.

api_ports.name: getInterestRates
api_ports.description: Get interest rate of currency and term

api_ports.name: convertCurrency
api_ports.description: Converts an amount from one currency to another.

api_ports.name: getWireTransferDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific wire transfer.

api_ports.name: initiateWireTransfer
api_ports.description: Initiates a wire transfer to an external bank account.

api_ports.name: getWireTransferStatus
api_ports.description: Retrieves the status of a specific wire transfer.

api_ports.name: cancelWireTransfer
api_ports.description: Cancels a pending wire transfer.

api_ports.name: getRecurringPaymentList
api_ports.description: Retrieves the list of all recurring payment in account.

api_ports.name: getRecurringPaymentDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific recurring payment.

api_ports.name: createRecurringPayment
api_ports.description: Creates a new recurring payment between accounts.

api_ports.name: updateRecurringPayment
api_ports.description: Updates the details of an existing recurring payment.

api_ports.name: cancelRecurringPayment
api_ports.description: Cancels a specific recurring payment.

api_ports.name: getCustomerDetails
api_ports.description: Retrieves the details of a specific customer.

api_ports.name: updateCustomerDetails
api_ports.description: Updates the personal details of a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerAccounts
api_ports.description: Retrieves a list of all accounts associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: linkAccountToCustomer
api_ports.description: Links an existing account to a specific customer.

api_ports.name: unlinkAccountFromCustomer
api_ports.description: Unlinks an account from a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerLoans
api_ports.description: Retrieves all loans associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerCreditCards
api_ports.description: Retrieves all credit cards associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerInvestments
api_ports.description: Retrieves all investments associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerInsurancePolicies
api_ports.description: Retrieves all insurance policies associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerMortgages
api_ports.description: Retrieves all mortgages associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerRecurringPayments
api_ports.description: Retrieves all recurring payments associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getCustomerBeneficiaries
api_ports.description: Retrieves a list of all beneficiaries linked to a specific customer.

api_ports.name: addBeneficiary
api_ports.description: Adds a new beneficiary to a customer's account.

api_ports.name: removeBeneficiary
api_ports.description: Removes a beneficiary from a customer's account.

api_ports.name: getCustomerNotifications
api_ports.description: Retrieves a list of notifications for a specific customer.

api_ports.name: sendNotificationToCustomer
api_ports.description: Sends a notification to a specific customer.

api_ports.name: getAccountAlerts
api_ports.description: Retrieves a list of alerts for a specific account.

api_ports.name: setAccountAlert
api_ports.description: Sets a new alert for a specific account.

api_ports.name: removeAccountAlert
api_ports.description: Removes an alert from a specific account.

api_ports.name: getCustomerDocuments
api_ports.description: Retrieves a list of documents associated with a specific customer.

api_ports.name: uploadCustomerDocument
api_ports.description: Uploads a new document to a customer's account.

api_ports.name: downloadCustomerDocument
api_ports.description: Downloads a specific document from a customer's account.
